member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_AudioHasPreemphasis
member.summary: Retrieves the value that specifies if an audio track has an additional pre-emphasis added to the audio data.
member.param: Value that specifies if an audio track has an additional pre-emphasis added to the audio data.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_DigitalAudioCopySetting
member.summary: Retrieves the value for the bit that represents the current digital audio copy setting on the resulting media. Please see the enumeration for possible values.
member.param: The current digital audio copy setting.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_ISRC
member.summary: Retrieves the International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) currently associated with the track. This property value defaults to NULL (or a zero-length string) and may only be set for tracks containing audio data.
member.param: The ISRC currently associated with the track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_SectorCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of user sectors in this track.
member.param: The number of user sectors in this track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_SectorType
member.summary: Retrieves the type of data provided for the sectors in this track. For more detail on the possible sector types, see .
member.param: A pointer to a enumeration that specifies the type of data provided for the sectors on the track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_StartingLba
member.summary: Retrieves the LBA of the first user sectors in this track.
member.param: The LBA of the first user sectors in this track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_TrackIndexes
member.summary: Retrieves the one-based index of the tracks on the disc.
member.param: The one-based index associated with this track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.get_TrackNumber
member.summary: Retrieves the track number for this track.
member.param: The track number for this track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.put_AudioHasPreemphasis
member.summary: Sets the value that specifies if an audio track has an additional pre-emphasis added to the audio data prior to being written to CD.
member.param: Value that specifies if an audio track has an additional pre-emphasis added to the audio data.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.put_DigitalAudioCopySetting
member.summary: Sets the digital audio copy "Allowed" bit to one of three values on the resulting media. Please see the enumeration for additional information on each possible value.
member.param: The digital audio copy setting value to assign.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo.put_ISRC
member.summary: Sets the International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) currently associated with the track. This property value defaults to NULL (or a zero-length string) and may only be set for tracks containing audio data.
member.param: The ISRC to associate with the track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageTrackInfo
member.summary: Use this interface to track per-track properties that are applied to CD media.
